name: Cinnamon Roll Icing (Cinnamon Roll Glaze)
description: Creamy Cinnamon Roll Icing made with 4 ingredients in 3 minutes! Cinnamon Roll Glaze turns homemade or store bought cinnamon rolls into the ultimate treat!
ingredients: 2 cup powdered sugar aka confectioner's sugar
4 tablespoon milk can substitute with heavy cream or half and half
instructions: Combine powdered sugar, melted butter, vanilla and milk in a large mixing bowl until smooth. Pour over warm rolls and spread.
